SEARCH
Module cz.cvut.fel.pjv.hofmaad
Package controller

Class NetworksController

java.lang.Object
controller.NetworksController
public class NetworksController extends Object
Manages the networking aspects of the simulation, including IP address allocation and network connections.

      Returns:

      second - The second router in the WAN link.

      public boolean isSameNetwork(PCModel initiator, PCModel recipient)
      Determines if two network devices are on the same network.
      Parameters:
      initiator - The initiating network device.
      recipient - The recipient network device.
      Returns:
